title: Waterproof Dog Bed Covers for Couch Protection, Water-Resistant Anti-Slip Soft Dog Pet Blanket, for Furniture Bed Couch Sofa (97x190cm,Grey)
features: 100% WATERPROOF - PICK FOR LIFE waterproof pet blanket has strict control towards water resistance. The both sides of surface fabric is waterproof and the attached TPU membrane can ensure the liquid will not penetrate the blanket,which can effectively prevent urine, spills
ANTI-SLIP FURNITURE COVER - Non-slip rubber backing design dog sofa cover help maximizes the pet blanket stay in place, so it doesn’t slide around. Perfect for your sofa, bed, or floor

EASY TO CLEAN - This reusable dog bed covers are easy to clean. Wash by hand or in the washing machine.Putting it in the dryer for low heat or hanging dry (helpful to prolong the service life). Durable washable dog cover are built to last and won't shrink after multiple washes

FURNITURE PROTECTOR - Our waterproof dog bed cover suitable for all types of furniture,especially for the sofa and bed. It will protect your furniture from puppy slobber ,hairs or pee. To protect your bed/sofa from the pet's scratching post

5-LAYERS MATERIAL - 101% polyester fiber. This premium bed cover is constructed with multi layers fabric. Made of unique fabric and special composite waterproof layer technology, which increases the overall strength and durability of the dog blanket while not affecting the softness at all

WATERPROOF & LEAK-PROOF A waterproof layer on the surface and a TPU membrane on the inside provide double waterproof protection against liquid leakage. Dogs can move freely on the pet blanket without worrying about getting wet or dirty. NON-SLIP BOTTOM The non-slip bottom design on the back helps to secure the dog blanket to the floor, so the waterproof dog blanket won't shift while your dog plays, runs and sleeps.
